column4: hi i just won a laptop on ebay with ATI Radeon X1400 can i do compiz with this?
should be able to. try it ous
have to wait to get it . . . cant believe i got it for $500
hopefully it doesnt suck
i got my laptop with a $200 instant rebate for $700,

ibm thinkpad t60  T2500(2GHz), 1GB RAM, 100GB 5400rpm HD, 15in 1400x1050 LCD, 128MB ATI Radeon X1400, CDRW/DVDRW, Intel 802.11abg wireless, WWAN, Bluetooth/Modem, 1Gb Ethernet, UltraNav, Secure chip, Fingerprint reader, 9c Li-Ion batt, WinXP Pro
i should have spent moe for one with an nvidea card
thats what i hear :P
but it seemed like a good deal
nice
he only used it for semester at school
and there is still a warranty and everything on it
cool
the top bidder wasnt able to pay
i didnt get warrenty because i buy computers so much its not worth it
yeah my t40 just died sorta
didnt think it was worth getting repaired
its sad when computers die, kinda brings a tear to my eyes
do you know if i can use the same ac cord with this one?
it depends on the voltage and ampage
the port replicator for the t40 probably wont work with it
yeah, its best to take it in and get matched up with a new cord if it doesnt come with one
i think it does come with one, i just wanted to use my two t40 cords as spares
